Ingredients.1: 2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed

Ingredients.3: 1 tablespoon curry powder, or to taste

Ingredients.5: 1 (8 ounce) package tempeh, cut into cubes

Ingredients.6: 5  small corn tortillas, cut into small triangles

Directions.1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat; add kale and curry powder. Cook and stir kale mixture in the hot oil until wilted, about 5 minutes. Add avocados, tempeh, and tortillas; cook and stir until dry, golden brown, and crunchy, 30 to 40 minutes.
